text: The Straw Hat (, translit. Solomennaya shlyapka) is a 1974 Russian musical comedy movie directed by Leonid Kvinikhidze and was based on the play by Eug√®ne Marin Labiche and Marc-Michel. It stars Andrei Mironov, Vladislav Strzhelchik, Zinovi Gerdt, Yefim Kopelyan, Igor Kvasha, Alisa Freindlich and was distributed by Lenfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 comedy movies Category:1970s musical movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Russian musical movies Category:Movies directed by Leonid Kvinikhidze
title: The Straw Hat
